page.title: 06Day in the life of Wayne(11)
page.content: I get up at 8.20,I put my clothes on and get washed and have my breakfast. Then I get into the car and go to school. I arrive at school at 8.45 and have a quick game of chess. Then at 9.00 the teacher comes and takes the register. Then we have assembly. When we get back at half past nine, we have maths until break time at 10.30. At 10.45 we have English until 12.00 and then we have a lunch break until 1.00. At one o'clock we have reading for half an hour then at about 1.35 we watch a geography programme on T.V. We have a break at 2.15 until 2.30. After break we have P.E. until 3.00. At 3.00 we have story or art. The order of the lessons changes every day. At 3.30 my mother picks me up in the car and we go home.
